Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 7 individuals, heart rate was measured at 8 mornings and 4 p.m., with the results being:______________. morning: 75, 74, 70, 79, 65, 70, 68. afternoon: 76, 76, 69, 80, 66, 73, 69. We want to test H~0~: μ(morning) = μ(afternoon) against H~1~: μ(morning) ≠ μ(afternoon). The right critical value of the test with a two-sided risk of 0.05 is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 2.4469
* 2.3646
* 2.1788
* 1.9432

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.4469: Correct
* 2.3646: Incorrect
* 2.1788: Incorrect
* 1.9432: Incorrect
